Author: TheAllMightiest
Text: Long-term solution: up your calorie intake. You're bitchy because you have low blood sugar constantly.  Short-term solution: yoga, meditation, but above all being conscious of what you're about to say, _how_ you're about to say it, and why (hint, it's your low blood sugar) every time you go to open your mouth.

Author: oulikealight
Text: it's definitely worth trying meditation, I use and app called headspace. Try it for a week and see if it helps, remember that it is kind of a skill you have to build so you might not be good at it straight away and it might feel hard,  but keep at it and it might really help
